scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred characteristics, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Analyze the deployed customer churn prediction model to identify high-value customers based on inferred customer characteristics.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management (CRM) system using a machine learning model to predict customer churn
